directions: Combine pumpkin puree, almond milk, water, pumpkin syrup, pumpkin pie spice, and sweetener in a blender. Blend until well combined, 5 to 10 seconds. Add ice cubes and blend until smooth.
ingredients: 2 packets stevia-erythritol sweetener (such as Truvia®), or to taste
title: Vegan Pumpkin Pie Smoothie
